Case Study

Tri-Star Systems

Enrollment & Benefits Workflow

Modernized participant application with Eleventy, Tailwind, and Alpine.js that integrates existing APIs and guides users through a complex, multi-step enrollment and benefits workflow.

Visit live site

Challenge

What they needed

Tri-Star Systems needed to modernize their participant-facing application while preserving existing backend APIs and guiding users through a complex enrollment and benefits review process.

Approach

How we solved it

Rebuilt the participant application using Eleventy templates and Tailwind CSS, integrating existing API endpoints and implementing advanced, state-driven workflows with Alpine.js to guide participants through sign-up, health information review, and insurance election confirmation.

Completed

November 2025

Website

https://www.tri-starsystems.com/

Stack highlights

  • Eleventy
  • Tailwind CSS
  • Alpine.js
  • JavaScript
  • REST API
